title: Did Tomi Lahren Say “Everyone Knows Mermaids Are White, Just Like Santa and Jesus”?
subtitle: "I will not sit idly by while liberals blackwash everyone from Marty McFly to Luke Skywalker to James Bond."
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Conservative political commentator Tomi Lahren said “Everyone knows mermaids are white, just like Santa and Jesus."
